attributes.action: make tampons and sanitry pads FREE on the NHS!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As women, we are all punished by having periods... why the hell should we have to spend £3-£4 a time to buy a supply of pads or tampons??
Men dont have this problem... therefore save themselves loads of money!

i feel we should get these prosducts free. we cant choose whether to have a period or not... why should we be charged!!
